publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1472 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 2 Committee reports to the Justice 1 Committee by 3 July 2004 on the Victim Statements (Prescribed Offences) (Scotland) Amendment (No.2) Order 2004 (SSI 2004/287). Supported by: Tavish Scott*
